I'm considering using JUnitPP, which allows me to have my test data
specified in a separate property file. To test my servlet, I really 
only need to create one ConfigurableTestCase class, but I need to 
instantiate it and run it multiple times, with different data.
Is there a simple way to do this? I'm considering writing a suite()
method that adds each instantiation/data accordingly, but I was 
wondering if there is  better way. JXUnit claims that it can 
accomplish this but it seems a bit complex to use.

Paul Harding
Algorithmics Inc.
subject: one TestCase with multiple data
